description: Evaluates a machine learning model on training/validation data using cross-validation or a hold-out split. Returns performance metrics such as accuracy, kappa, precision, recall, and F1 score.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: An untrained machine learning model object that will be trained and evaluated.

parameters.name: training_data
parameters.description: Training samples. Can be provided as a URL to a data file, a local file path, or an inline data object depending on the backend implementation.

parameters.name: validation_data
parameters.description: Optional separate validation samples. If not provided, validation is performed using a split from training_data or cross-validation.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Name of the target/label column in the data.

parameters.name: validation_split
parameters.description: Fraction of training data used for validation when no validation_data is provided and cv <= 1.

parameters.name: cv
parameters.description: Number of cross-validation folds. If 0 or 1, uses a single train/validation split instead of cross-validation.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility of data splits and model training.
